attributes.review: As a fellow frump supporter I just KNEW I needed the app to stay informed. But the first thing that popped up on this app was the need for my phone number, AS IF (I’m only 16!!! As if that matters to frump lol with all the r*p* he’s done I know it wouldn’t matter to him😊)😫Like people always say opposites attract but I feel this is very incorrect... a gorgeous beast😚✌️ like me and a pig😰, NO THANK YOU. Also I can’t seem to find any of the hair extension pieces that the pig uses and if rlly like to find them for my farm animals but it seems that I can’t find them on the website or the app😡😡😡 Donald I love your app✨🧚🧚🧚 in the trash tho✨✨🧚🧚😌
attributes.title: Love the app✨🧚 in the trash✨🧚

attributes.review: I wanted to download the app because you know, support our President. It asked me for my race and when I put down Latino it locked me out. I was furious because it didn’t so if I was born here or not and now it will shut down the app before it even loads. Every once in a while the so will send an alert saying, “ Go back to your home!” I WAS BORN HERE!!! For everyone who downloads this, know that this man hates Latinos no matter how much we love this country. Overall, bad experience.
attributes.title: IT DIDNT LET ME DO ANYTHING!!

attributes.review: What a horrible app! Took 4 hours to download, and even more time to sign in. As a republican this app is absolutely disgusting and doesn’t convey what we are about at all!
attributes.title: Disgusting!

attributes.title: WORST APP!!!

attributes.review:
When I first downloaded this app I was ready to praise our Oompa Loompa of a president. I opened it and my eyes🇺🇸 we’re blessed at the sight of a cheesy Cheeto. A few weeks went by and everything was just GREAT👍🤩I was ready to hop on over to the tree but then I heard I rumble inside my house while I was browsing🇺🇸 threw Facebook (TikTok) and my fluffy dorken shmirt started to scream 💕four💕in💕her💕four💕in💕her💕I almost dropped my croissant 🥐 . All of a sudden my roof started to fly away and do the ✨renegade✨and on it it said TRUMP 2020. i did NOT write that. So I checked the app where 🇺🇸 I last saw this Oompa🇺🇸 Loompa and it started crashing and writing all over my iPhone 5 ✨🧚🏻‍♀️❤️TRUMP 2020❤️✨🧚🏻‍♀️❤️✨✨. These words matched with the font on my roof. (It kinda looked like a fairy comment) Then I was blasted to Pluto where I rejoiced at the sight of my best friend, her pet dorken shmirt. Cheese huddlson, the girl he cheated on and Addison ranaenae(guess I figured out why she disappeared). They had the same ✨EXACT✨experience🇺🇸 as me so we connected the ⚪️dots⚪️ and realized 
👁👄👁this was all 🧚🏻‍♀️HIS🧚🏻‍♀️ fault. OUR ✨OOMPA LOOMPA✨ PRESIDENT. We are now STUCK UP HERE ON PLUTO BECAUSE OF HIM. Thank A LOT CHEETO.🧚🏻‍♂️❤️🙂✨🌟⛄️🏳️‍🌈🇺🇸🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♀️🤶😹🥱YOU ARE NOT ✨💕❤️🧚🏻‍♀️INVITED TO THE TREE✨💕❤️🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: This app 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️is appalling✨❤️! ✨👍DO NOT GET👍✨
